name: Olympic Games 2021 by orazio
description:
The name of the game is: "Olympic games 2021". It falls into the pure-80 group. The game is simple, take advantage of the horizontal scrolling, when the athlete is close to the obstacle, he will have to jump it. The jump must be a perfect pixel, otherwise there is a risk of elimination and the game will start again. At the bottom of the screen is an obstacle counter, which will tell you how many you have overcome.
Tested with Blue-MSX and Open-Msx Emulators. 
To jump, use the up cursor key.
